title: The Magic of Vegetables?
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Summer barbeques are the best! Hey, hey, Umi, have some meat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you. Here, have some vegetables, Lanzhu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu doesn’t want any.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You don’t want any!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu loves meat, so it’s okay if the barbeque only has meat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s not good to have an unbalanced diet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu doesn’t want to eat any!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>......Look, if you wrap the meat with lettuce like this, then it’ll bring out the flavor of the meat even more. Please, just try it once.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Hmm~ Just this once, then. Nom...... Hmm, not bad! Umi, one more, please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
